revised_title: Chemical Analysis of Boghead Coal Distillate
tldr: The author investigates the chemical composition of Boghead Coal distillate, a commercial product containing hydrocarbons. Through a series of distillations and chemical reactions, the author isolates various hydrocarbons and analyzes their properties, providing evidence for their chemical structures and boiling points. This study contributes to the understanding of the complex chemical reactions and products resulting from the destructive distillation of organic substances.
